channel.title: UK on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in UK on PepsFeeder

item.title: Historic breakthrough of Sinn Fein in the legislative elections in Ireland
item.description: Prime Minister Leo Varadkar’s party, Fine Gael, was the big loser in this Sunday, February 9, election. He comes third. A setback for the party of Prime Minister Leo Varadkar, the Fine Gael, which comes in the third position.

item.title: Brexit agreement definitively validated by Parliament
item.description: The text, which regulates the terms of the divorce, must still be promulgated by Queen Elizabeth II, possibly as early as Thursday, to have the force of law.

item.title: The discovery leads to drugs targeting dozens of types of cancer
item.description: By turning off genes one by one, researchers from the United Kingdom and the United States have targeted cancer with new drugs. The author, Sean Lintern, said in a report in the British newspaper “The Independent”, that scientists have made an important step towards developing new drugs that target specific genes within dozens of types of cancer.
